trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when authentication fails for an authentication stream and cannot be retried.
trans-unit.target: 當驗證資料流驗證失敗且無法重試時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class throws this exception when authentication fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>類別在驗證失敗時，會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception indicates that the underlying stream isn't in a valid state and that you can't retry the authentication using the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個例外狀況表示基礎資料流不是處於有效狀態，而且您無法重試驗證使用<xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you retry the authentication, an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> is thrown instead of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試再次驗證，<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>而不是擲回<xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> class with no message.
trans-unit.target: 不使用任何訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
這個建構函式沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the authentication failure.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性中的文字`message`參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance that contains the information required to deserialize the new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 執行個體，包含還原序列化新 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> 執行個體時所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> class from the specified instances of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 類別的已指定執行個體，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the authentication failure.
The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 導致目前例外狀況的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> class with the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息和內部例外狀況初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter and initializes the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property with the `innerException` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性中的文字`message`參數，並初始化<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性`innerException`參數值。
